name: Men's Classic Leather Loafers
description: Elegant leather loafers with a smooth finish, perfect for formal occasions and casual settings alike.

name: Women's Casual Sneakers
description: Lightweight and comfortable sneakers for everyday casual wear.

name: Kids' Sports Running Shoes
description: Durable and flexible running shoes designed for kids who love to stay active.

reviews.name: Ravi Singh
reviews.comment: My son loves these shoes! Perfect for school and play.

reviews.name: Kavita Patel
reviews.comment: Very durable but the color faded a bit after washing.

name: Men's Outdoor Trekking Boots
description: Rugged and durable trekking boots for outdoor enthusiasts. Perfect for hiking and rough terrains.

reviews.name: Suresh Nair
reviews.comment: Absolutely love these boots! Great grip and comfort during long treks.

reviews.name: Vinay Gupta
reviews.comment: Very sturdy, but took a bit longer to break in.

name: Women's Stylish Heels
description: Elegant and stylish heels with a cushioned sole, perfect for formal events or casual outings.

reviews.name: Meera Jain
reviews.comment: Beautiful heels! Very comfortable to wear for long hours.

reviews.name: Simran Verma
reviews.comment: Looks good but not as comfortable as expected.
